node.title: Man charged after laser shone at rescue helicopter
node.description: A South Dunedin man has been charged after a laser was shone into the cockpit of the Otago Rescue Helicopter.
node.content:
["A South Dunedin man has been charged after a laser was shone into the cockpit of the Otago Rescue Helicopter.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Richard Tindiller\n
", "The pilot called police about 1.45am today and guided officers to the laser's origin.", "Police say a car took off from the address without its lights on before officers arrived.", "The vehicle was stopped nearby and the driver admitted shining the laser at the helicopter.", "A 33-year-old man will appear in Dunedin District Court next week."]
